attributes.action: Make the district line run up to grays
attributes.additional_details: This a cheaper opportunity for people who use public transport as well as it becoming mode developed and is a fresh start to these key areas in thurrock
attributes.background: The c2c grays train station allows you to use a zip/ oyster card to get on and off the train so I believe the district should continue to run from  upmister to ockendon and aveley as well as grays. Theses areas are growing rapidly and see alot of students and adults working or studying in london.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about tube line routes are a matter for Transport for London, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
